quote: Freedom isn't free. It shouldn't be a bragging point that 'Oh, I don't get involved in politics,' as if that makes someone cleaner. No, that makes you derelict of duty in a republic. Liars and panderers in government would have a much harder time of it if so many people didn't insist on their right to remain ignorant and blindly agreeable.
author: Bill Maher

quote: However, people need to understand that it ain't that deep to try and convince people of what your persona is. You are who you are, and what you are will show in time. What you aren't can be hidden, but eventually it will come to light. Long story short: rappers should never take themselves too seriously.
author: Wale

quote: If you look at the history of technology over a couple hundred years, it's all about time compression and making the globe smaller. It's had positive effects, all the ones that we know. So we're much less likely to have the kind of terrible misunderstandings that led to World War I, for example.
author: Eric Schmidt

quote: Regardless if what you do in the world, you do it good. You do your best, and you show up on time, and you leave and you do a good job, and you treat people the way you want to be treated.
author: Scott Eastwood

quote: One of my earliest memories is of seeing my mother in her beach chair, reading a book under an umbrella by the water's edge while my sisters and I played beside her. Of all the life lessons she taught me, that is one of my favorites: to take time at a place I love, restore my spirit with books and the beach.
author: Luanne Rice

quote: There is no room for second place. There is only one place in my game and that is first place. I have finished second twice in my time at Green Bay and I never want to finish second again.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?
author: Scott Adams

quote: It is strange that the years teach us patience; that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: When I was in lower school, I graduated from fourth grade, and the principal gave us a summer assignment to take a 30-minute reflection period every day. And, of course, there were no cell phones at the time. She said to just think. And that's lost. It doesn't exist anymore. Just imagine being on a couch and just thinking.
author: Ansel Elgort

quote: I have been known for some time as a person who speaks the truth and speaks it strongly. I have always called a liar a liar and a hypocrite a hypocrite.
author: Cindy Sheehan

quote: Oratory is the masterful art. Poetry, painting, music, sculpture, architecture please, thrill, inspire - but oratory rules. The orator dominates those who hear him, convinces their reason, controls their judgment, compels their action. For the time being, he is master.
author: David Josiah Brewer

quote: Time is the school in which we learn, time is the fire in which we burn.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: Live-tweeting your bikini wax is not vulnerability. Nor is posting a blow-by-blow of your divorce . That's an attempt to hot-wire connection. But you can't cheat real connection. It's built up slowly. It's about trust and time.
author: Brene Brown

quote: All our sweetest hours fly fastest.
author: Virgil

quote: The current practice of extending U.S. citizenship to hundreds of thousands of 'anchor babies' must end because it creates a magnet for illegal immigration into our country. Now is the time to ensure that the laws in this country do not encourage law-breaking.
author: Steve King

quote: Fortunately, human forgetting follows a pattern. We forget exponentially. A graph of our likelihood of getting the correct answer on a quiz sweeps quickly downward over time and then levels off.
author: Gary Wolf

quote: Time is the father of truth, its mother is our mind.
author: Giordano Bruno

quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Until you value yourself, you won't value your time. Until you value your time, you will not do anything with it.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I can only note that the past is beautiful because one never realises an emotion at the time. It expands later, and thus we don't have complete emotions about the present, only about the past.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Do not waste time dreaming of great faraway opportunities; do the best you can where you are. Open your petals of power and beauty and fling out the fragrance of your life in the place that has been assigned to you.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I still love things that you don't even need to pay for. Going to the beach and being around five of your friends and having a good time means so much more than going out and spending hundreds of dollars.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: It's better to waste money, than it is to waste time. You can always get more money.
author: Hal Sparks

quote: If I'm ever having a good time, I'll write about it so I'll remember it.
author: Brantley Gilbert

quote: A thought transfixed me: for the first time in my life, I saw the truth as it is set into song by so many poets, proclaimed as the final wisdom by so many thinkers. The truth - that love is the ultimate and the highest goal to which man can aspire.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Close to a billion people - one-eighth of the world's population - still live in hunger. Each year 2 million children die through malnutrition. This is happening at a time when doctors in Britain are warning of the spread of obesity. We are eating too much while others starve.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Filming is a funny combination of having a good time and not being able to wait until it's over.
author: Nicole Holofcener

quote: Time travel is such a magic concept.
author: Matt Smith

quote: The road to recovery will not always be easy, but I will take it one day at a time, focusing on the moments I've dreamed about for so long.
author: Amanda Lindhout

quote: The world is like a reverse casino. In a casino, if you gamble long enough, you're certainly going to lose. But in the real world, where the only thing you're gambling is, say, your time or your embarrassment, then the more stuff you do, the more you give luck a chance to find you.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Deadlines aren't bad. They help you organize your time. They help you set priorities. They make you get going when you might not feel like it.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: There's just something wonderful about getting a small group of people together in an isolated location, and there's something about cabins themselves that imply both horror and fun. When you go to a cabin, you're usually going to have a good time.
author: Drew Goddard

quote: The thing about New York is, more than any other place I've ever been, you run into people on the street that you would never imagine you'd see, old friends, people just like there for a day or two. I find that all the time when I'm walking around Manhattan, running into people that I had no idea were even there.
author: Michael Shannon

quote: I cannot believe in a God who wants to be praised all the time.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When I was younger, the idea of the bad boy was appealing, but then I grew up and realized that stable people are more fulfilling. Bad boys need more time to themselves. I want to be in a relationship with someone who knows how to take care of himself and is therefore able to take care of me. That way, we can put each other first.
author: Jessica Parker Kennedy

quote: Computers are still technology because we are still wrestling with it: it's still being invented; we're still trying to work out how it works. There's a world of game interaction to come that you or I wouldn't recognise. It's time for the machines to disappear. The computer's got to disappear into all of the things we use.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: All civilization has from time to time become a thin crust over a volcano of revolution.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: I was in my thirteenth year when I heard a voice from God to help me govern my conduct. And the first time I was very much afraid.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: The theatre is a spiritual and social X-ray of its time.
author: Stella Adler

quote: It's really important to share the idea that being different might feel like a problem at the time, but ultimately diversity is a strength.
author: Carson Kressley

quote: The minute we stop learning, we begin death, the process of dying. We learn from each other with every action we perform. We are teaching goodness or evil every time we step out of the house and into the street.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I do not read advertisements. I would spend all of my time wanting things.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: My view is there's no bad time to innovate.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Music is given to us with the sole purpose of establishing an order in things, including, and particularly, the coordination between man and time.
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: I'm just a lucky slob from Ohio who happened to be in the right place at the right time.
author: Clark Gable

quote: Time makes more converts than reason.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: No, no, I don't watch football. The last time I tried watching was the last Super Bowl. The problem I have is, you know, the graphic nature of my imagination; when I watch and see them meeting head onto head, helmet onto helmet, what flashes through my mind is what's going on in their brains. It's like torture to me.
author: Bennet Omalu

quote: The first thing which I can record concerning myself is, that I was born. These are wonderful words. This life, to which neither time nor eternity can bring diminution - this everlasting living soul, began. My mind loses itself in these depths.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: So during those first moments of the day, which are yours and yours alone, you can circumvent these boundaries and concentrate fully on spiritual matters. And this gives you the opportunity to plan the time management of the entire day.
author: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quote: We take it for granted that we can see at all times of day and night. But there was a time, not all that long ago, in the age before electricity, when night brought total darkness - and with it, a not-so-small amount of terror. We get a sense of this when we go camping or when there's a power outage, and our fear of the darkness is primal.
author: Jake Halpern

quote: Mindfulness helps you go home to the present. And every time you go there and recognize a condition of happiness that you have, happiness comes.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Time goes, you say? Ah, no! alas, time stays, we go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: The past always looks better than it was. It's only pleasant because it isn't here.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Now is the age of anxiety.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: True time is four-dimensional.
author: Martin Heidegger

quote: For me, not owning a car means I may spend a little extra time on public transportation, but I can use that time to read, catch up on work projects, and make the phone calls I couldn't get to earlier. Plus, I never waste time at the mechanics or gas station.
author: Lynn Jurich

quote: The time I kill is killing me.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Each moment is perfect and heaven-sent, in that each moment holds the seeds for growth.
author: Suzan-Lori Parks

quote: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever.
author: Herb Caen

quote: It has been said that time heals all wounds. I don't agree. The wounds remain. Time - the mind, protecting its sanity - covers them with some scar tissue and the pain lessens, but it is never gone.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Forever is composed of nows.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I was a terrible student. Still, I managed to get into college, but my daydreaming threatened to sabotage me. I used behavior modification to break the cycle. I started by setting an arbitrary time limit on studying: for every 15 minutes of study, I'd allow myself an hour of daydreaming. I set the alarm.
author: Sandra Cisneros

quote: The relationship between you and your boss will change over time. When you just started out, that boss was your mentor and took you under their wing. As a seasoned employee, though, you no longer need your boss to guide you along. You should be able to handle tasks on your own.
author: John Rampton

quote: Send out a cheerful, positive greeting, and most of the time you will get back a cheerful, positive greeting. It's also true that if you send out a negative greeting, you will, in most cases, get back a negative greeting.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: After a workout, you definitely have to have a protein shake. I drink my six-pound whey protein all the time, too. I throw some fruit in there - strawberries, blueberries - with some peanut butter and banana, and it gives you all the recovery you need from a hard day of lifting and running.
author: Rob Gronkowski

quote: Time is only an idea. There is only the Reality. Whatever you think it is, it looks like that. If you call it time, it is time. If you call it existence, it is existence, and so on. After calling it time, you divide it into days and nights, months, years, hours, minutes, etc. Time is immaterial for the Path of Knowledge.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I have just got a new theory of eternity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of 60 minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I respect everybody, but at the same time, I carry myself with an aura that demands respect, too.
author: Lil' Kim

quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: We can't solve modern problems by going back in time. Retreating to the safety of the familiar is an understandable response, but God has called us to a life of faith. And faith requires us to face the unknown while trusting Him completely.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: You can't go forward and backwards at the same time.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: I'm not good at being a picture-perfect pop star, happy all the time. If I'm having a bad day, I can't pretend. I'm always a bit unhappy, but that's just me. I like dwelling in my sadness.
author: Charli XCX

quote: I'm not afraid of turning 80 and I have lots of things to do. I don't have time for dying.
author: Ingvar Kamprad

quote: I can be a goofball sometimes. I love having a good time and being carefree.
author: Spencer Boldman

quote: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: When it's your time, it is your time.
author: Bruno Mars

quote: People will kill you over time, and how they'll kill you is with tiny, harmless phrases, like 'be realistic.'
author: Dylan Moran

quote: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: Finding some quiet time in your life, I think, is hugely important.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: For time is the longest distance between two places.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Women can't do everything at the same time, we need to understand milestones in our lives comes in segments.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: Everything happens to everybody sooner or later if there is time enough.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: It's time to stop the raid on the Social Security trust fund and start allowing Americans to invest their Social Security taxes in personal savings accounts.
author: Mike Pence

quote: Creative people don't behave very well generally. If you're looking for examples of good relationships in show business, you're gonna be depressed real fast. I don't have time for anything else right now but work and my daughter. She's my first priority.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Most of us aren't defeated in one decisive battle. We are defeated one tiny, seemingly insignificant surrender at a time that chips away at who we should really be.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Time brings all things to pass.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Lose not yourself in a far off time, seize the moment that is thine.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Time does not change us. It just unfolds us.
author: Max Frisch

quote: Time has a way of demonstrating that the most stubborn are the most intelligent.
author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: What then is time? If no one asks me, I know what it is. If I wish to explain it to him who asks, I do not know.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Time is bunk.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: My father believed in toughness, honesty, politeness and being on time. All very important lessons.
author: Roger Moore

quote: The trouble with our times is that the future is not what it used to be.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Time, the devourer of all things.
author: Ovid

quote: Know how to live the time that is given you.
author: Dario Fo

quote: Day, n. A period of twenty-four hours, mostly misspent.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I want to go ahead of Father Time with a scythe of my own.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Nothing puzzles me more than the time and space; and yet nothing troubles me less.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Time makes heroes but dissolves celebrities.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Who makes quick use of the moment is a genius of prudence.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: Both young children and old people have a lot of time on their hands. That's probably why they get along so well.
author: Jonathan Carroll

quote: In times like these, it helps to recall that there have always been times like these.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: By the time we've made it, we've had it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: You must have been warned against letting the golden hours slip by; but some of them are golden only because we let them slip by.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: We have not the time to take our time.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: The present time has one advantage over every other - it is our own.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: It is my feeling that Time ripens all things; with Time all things are revealed; Time is the father of truth.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: The one thing I regret is that I will never have time to read all the books I want to read.
author: Francoise Sagan

quote: When Time is spent, Eternity begins.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: The best way to fill time is to waste it.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
author: Roger Babson

quote: The clock talked loud. I threw it away, it scared me what it talked.
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: And when is there time to remember, to sift, to weigh, to estimate, to total?
author: Tillie Olsen

quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
author: Faith Baldwin

quote: It would take six months to get to Mars if you go there slowly, with optimal energy cost. Then it would take eighteen months for the planets to realign. Then it would take six months to get back, though I can see getting the travel time down to three months pretty quickly if America has the will.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Put two ships in the open sea, without wind or tide, and, at last, they will come together. Throw two planets into space, and they will fall one on the other. Place two enemies in the midst of a crowd, and they will inevitably meet; it is a fatality, a question of time; that is all.
author: Jules Verne

quote: Time, whose tooth gnaws away everything else, is powerless against truth.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: I confess, I do not believe in time.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: For disappearing acts, it's hard to beat what happens to the eight hours supposedly left after eight of sleep and eight of work.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Much may be done in those little shreds and patches of time which every day produces, and which most men throw away.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: We must go fast, because the race is against time.
author: Anna Held

quote: Time is a beautiful thing. It's like when you meet an old lover on the street six years later and they don't look so ugly anymore.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: Time is nature's way of keeping everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: The present is a point just passed.
author: David Russell

quote: O sweet, delusive Noon, Which the morning climbs to find, O moment sped too soon, And morning left behind.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
author: Mark Helprin

quote: I took some time out for life.
author: James L. Brooks

quote: Time was God's first creation.
author: Walter Lang

quote: Perfection is the child of time.
author: Joseph Hall

quote: Eternity: a moment standing still for ever.
author: James Montgomery

quote: Time and space - time to be alone, space to move about - these may well become the great scarcities of tomorrow.
author: Edwin Way Teale

quote: The time to hesitate is through.
author: Robby Krieger

quote: My time is now.
author: John Turner

quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
author: Dion Boucicault
